content.content: Community Call: Incognito Protocol and Wallet, Private Dai? | Mar 09, 17:00 UTC  Maker Youtube March 09 20211280×720 27.8 KB  Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-02-23T17:00:00Z  Join Details Join through the Crowdcast Event Page.  Agenda Intro by @Davidutro. Presentation by Andrey Bugaevski (@boogaav) Open Q&A  Information About Incognito We will be joined by Andrey Bugaevski from Incognito Protocol, an Ethereum Sidechain focused on privacy.    End of the Chain – 13 Feb 20    Andrey Bugaevski Incognito Podcast Show Notes - End of the Chain Show notes for the End of the Chain podcast episode with Andrey Bugaevski and host Samuel McCulloch         Incognito – 23 Feb 21    The Incognito privacy stack - How am I private? Incognito is a privacy ecosystem. It’s not a single privacy coin, it’s a place you can go to use any of your favorite cryptocurrencies privately.  It’s not a mixer, it’s a layer of privacy that protects you while you’re in it.  Simply shielding and...  Reading time: 5 mins 🕑 Likes: 50 ❤           Incognito brings anonymous DAI transactions with close to zero fee (Intro) Community Development       Hey guys   It’s Andrey from Incognito. Previously I showed up with the ambition of Making DAI a default stable coin on Incognito pDEX. This time I would like to show you how we anonymized $3.5M DAI.  There are a lot of discussions is going on around privacy and gas fee topics. I would like to share how we solved those two problems.  Let me pitch to you the wallet itself Incognito wallet allows you to store, transfer, trade, and invest DAI anonymously. By anonymously I mean:   Your wallet b…
